content.detailedDescription:
June of 2013 i was having my vacation in thessaloniki - greece.  at night i was practicing my photo shooting and i captured what you see in the photos.
i'm not sure what is that.  i just noticed is seemed like moving
although the camera was still.
in my first photo it looks round and still.  in the 2nd and 3rd photos it changed position and shape, like it was moving.  i remember for sure it wasn't the moon because the moon was much above from the frame i captured with my camera.  the photos are genuine.
content.summary: Photoshooting at night in thessaloniki greece, captured something strange. first looked in 1 photo like a ball, but then in other photos it seemed moving, in a different position, and bullet shape

content.detailedDescription:
05/24/2014 @ 9:45pm.  (15 sec. sighting, two witnesses) clear, cloudless night with dead calm wind conditions.  

it was a beautiful evening and my wife and i went outside to sit on the deck of our lake home to view the stars and the milky way galaxy on this excellent viewing night.  then, within a few minutes she mentions that she sees an orange ball of light moving over the lake (southwest to northeast direction) to my right (the lake home faces south east).  i immediately focus my attention to a glowing orange and yellow orb in the sky, moving about 30 mph to the northeast, directly over the center of the lake and at an altitude of ~ 200 ft. above the surface of the water.  the orange, glowing orb was completely silent and moved parallel with the surface of the water.  after the orb moved about 400 or 500 yds. to the northeast, the orb instantly ���blinked��� out!

observations: at first, i thought the orange orb was a comet!  however, i quickly dismissed that in a few seconds���  next, i thought it could be a meteor streaking across the sky but realized this was no meteor/shooting star or satellite traversing the sky after another second or two.  finally, i thought i was looking at a chinese lantern but i quickly dismissed that since the night was perfectly still with no wind whatsoever that would blow a chinese light parallel with the water surface @ 30mph!
 
i now carefully observed the glowing orange/yellow orb and observed it for ~ 10 sec. and saw that the orange glowing orb actually had a rectangular/trapezoid shape that constantly rotated and change actual shape!  most interesting was that i noticed there was a distinctly bright, pin-point of light (like a very, very bright star��� but with perhaps 10 times the brightness magnitude that was very piercing in sharpness and intensity to the naked eye).  the bright star-like pin point of light was more glowing with a very, very bright yellow color than the orange glow that was around it, and the further you got from the light source, the more orange the gaseous glow became. however, there seemed to be a distinct design to the glowing nature of the orb that struck me the most!  

my wife and i continued to observe the object together until it instantly ���winked out��� of sight five or six homes down to our left field of view.  

i carefully asked my wife what she saw and she could only say that it was definitely a glowing orange mass of light that quickly moved over the middle of the lake until we both saw it blink out after viewing for ~ 15 sec.

the gaseous orb/object definitely was rotating and changed shape as it moved to the northeast!
content.summary: Orange glowing orange orb(trapezoid shape to glow) with very bright yellow star-like pin point of light inside orb

content.detailedDescription: Found a petroglyph
content.summary: Please call i found a petroglyph

content.detailedDescription: Outside at mom's nursing home: she was fascinated by the alto-cirrus clouds and kept on telling me to look up. but, she thought passenger jets did it. a jetliner was flying by and i pointed out the difference to her. she couldn't see it anyway. it was then i saw two ufos. i stopped pushing her wheelchair, and pretty much stopped talking. i observed these two odd, hovering lights, that looked like stars in a blue sky, slowly float away. she couldn't see them (her eyes will be 89 in just a few days). as they drifted off, they would get closer and then farther apart from each other. they didn't do that crazy 'fly fifty miles in half a second' thing. just floated off like a child's lost balloon. but, this was no "weather balloon". they behaved nothing like a plane, helicopter, or a satellite. i glanced away for a couple of seconds. when i looked back, i'd lost them. i'm a big airplane buff and i know how things in the sky are supposed to move. this wasn't that. lifelong believer, i was a little disappointed in the boringness of my first ever and only ufo sighting....But i'm now going to keep my eyes trained upwards. who knows what i've been missing by shoegazing!
content.summary: Two star-like lights high in sky floating away slowly

content.detailedDescription: I am not sure on how to explain my situation. my first experience occurred when i was 7 years old. in a home i lived in while looking out the kitchen window i was staring at a grey white being as like it was communicating to me.Then as i was growing up i had experienced several other encounters and witnessed visual being and u.F.O. sitings . but the biggest event occurred while i was in the navy in point loma ca. while i was on submarine duty i had 3 encounters witch in some fashion i do have documented through my physiologist.I just need someone from m.U.F.O.N .To look at what has took place. i would like to post in detail what took place but it is hard for me to post it on a public site being the it goes against all of what we were taught growing up .Recently i have been working with ncis and trying to get in detail from the foia on how the navy conducted the investigation . the event that happened did cost me my carrier in the navy. i have been back home since. the thing that happened i thought was over until i was involved in an elevator accident 8 years ago .  it all had resurfaced while ligation was pending as they asked me questions about the elevator and what happened ,i kept reverting to what took placed in 1988 .It has been a puzzle for me on how to explain in detail what happened without someone thinking i am out of my mind. my ligation fell through do to my testimony kept swaying from the elevator to  another event that took place 25 years ago.I know what is out there. i know what is going on .I have been exposed to or have a certain access to stuff i don't no how to explain it .I hope by contacting mufon i might be able to get some resolve. if you need further information you my contact me .
content.summary: It appered to quick but the event felt like days.

content.detailedDescription: I wanted a decent shot of the night sky so i went to pier cove beach in fennville,mi which is the closest low light pollution area around . i set up my camera and pointed it at polaris for a star trail shot with hopefully a few of the camelopardalid meteors in it. shortly after starting the intervalometer i spotted an orange orb come over the horizon from the then visible milwaukee mirage and it just flew around over lake michigan with no identifying lights or sound.  it moved effortlessly.  it looked as if it was going to stop but then it would accelerate.  the orb looked sort of like an airplane that's taking off and still has its lights on but when it moves in a different direction the light never dims even when it moves away from you. since this was not the first orange orb i've witnessed around the lake i just watched it and let my camera be.  luckily the orb flew in frame, down the beach and out of sight. the last time i saw orbs at the lake was in 2012 during the persied meteor shower.  that time there were three of them and they moved in patterns that gave me goosebumps and made me question what i thought i knew about our world.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: An orange orb came over the horizon and sat still in the sky for a few minutes and then proceed to come towards us and then turned and went up the coast.

content.detailedDescription:
Street heading towards the lake, and seen 3 lights hovering over the trees. i pulled over, and watched for a few minutes by dam at lake shawnee in topeka kansas. it didn't seem to move. i then got back in my car and headed to a closer spot by 29th, and west edge rd, and by the time i got to that location it was gone. not really sure what it was, didn't really want to spend time posting on here but figured why not. it was rather weird.

lots of people should have seen it as the boys, and girls softball diamonds had games going. and the lake was pretty busy with people.
content.summary: Drove down 29th street heading towards the lake, and seen 3 lights hovering over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: i am a trained ex mufon  observer. i walked out to my driveway and was looking at the night sky. i noticed a triangle of lights that should not have been in this area. i then noticed that they were moving slowly to the north. all had the same white intensity. one by one they went out. i stayed and watched the area for five minutes and saw nothing. having many years in the mufon fi and asd, i think i know what i am looking at. my possibilities include, three satellites, not likely' three aircraft; very unlikely; atmospheric sprites; very unlikely; and three unknowns.  i felt that it was a little odd that i happen to be looking at this area and i saw this, however, it would not be the first time i have seen these. i have seen many over the years.
content.summary: Three white lights in triangle moving north, then fading out one by one

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in my yard, saw a light then another light....5 altogether light up one at a time, then go out one at a time. oldest to newest first. no sound, happened twice with second time being a little right to the first spot. then after the second time starred an audibly loud helicopter flew in the opposite direction. freaked my neighbor and i out big time.
content.summary: 5 re dish lights in a row showing up then going out in order

content.detailedDescription: i just noticed this orb in some photo's i took this past weekend while trying to capture pics od rain drops. i have a sequence of pic i captured over a period of 1 minute per my cell phone pictre log. i didn't notice the orb when i was taking only after in these shots. i have several. the first few you see the rain drops then as the cloids move on this orb appears and moves around.  i can send additional pics if need. there are about 14 total showing before and after as i clicked. we were camping at dar state forest. i was sitting at our campsite taking pics above.
content.summary: Orbs captured in photos

content.detailedDescription:
About 130am on may 27, 2014 i let the dog out before i went to bed, i go out with her at night in case there is a raccoon in my backyard. when i stepped out i noticed a bright lite just a pinch to sw from due west in a 10 o'clock angle, i remember thinking that is awful lot of bright lights for an airplane or helicopter. the weather clear with patchy clouds, wind calm, temperature muggy, there were no clouds where the object was seen. 

i was standing on my back porch waiting for my dog to do her business & i noticed the object wasn't moving, i was able to gauge this by the power lines & trees in my backyard, it always stayed in the same place. i also noticed there were no blinking lights like an airplanes or helicopter would have, the lights were all white & twinkling. i watched it for a couple more minutes & decided to go get my binoculars for a better look.

when i came back out it was still there so i able to adjust the lens to get a clear look at it. it was rectangular at an angle with a bunch sparkling lights located in no particular order which looked like they were going on & off, but what was weird was a solid bar of light near the bottom. then the solid bar of light moved to the middle of the object, then after a couple of minutes the bar moved back to it's original position. all this time i'm thinking this has got to be a blimp or balloon but then all of sudden it turned into a diamond shape & the solid lit bar was gone. maybe it turned to the left to make it look like a different shape, i don't know, all i know is i'm looking at thru the binoculars and it changed shape just like that. 

about this time i decided to go get my camera & a stronger pair of binoculars, by the time i came back outside i thought it was closer because it looked just a little bit bigger, but maybe that was because i took my eyes off it for a couple of minutes. so i turn on my camera (it is a digital canon rebel with a wide angle & zoom lens) & try to zoom into the object but i couldn't find it in the viewfinder. so i my eyes off the viewfinder to re-orientate where to point the camera & i notice it is still in the same place but now it is just tiny speck of light. so i try find it in my viewfinder again but couldn't, when i looked again and it was gone. whatever it was must of took off heading in the direction i was looking because it was gone in 2-3 seconds at a 10 o'clock angle. i looked all around the back yard to see if more of them were out, but only saw the one

during all this time i never heard any noise, my dog & i were completely calm, just curious. like to see it again....
content.summary: Strange light over kansas city

content.detailedDescription: i had been lying on my bed at home...I remember thinking that i was bored and decided i would walk up to the park and see if any kids were there to play with. the park was less than a block from my home. there were 2 separate parks.. the ball field and across the street were swings basketball..Sandbox etc..I walked past the ball field crossed the street to the playground..No one was about..I turned around to walk back home...As soon as i crossed the street next to the ball field, i looked to my left and seen the hovering object at tree top level just beyond the ball park..Blimp like...Stationary...No sounds.. no lights...No windows..No appendages...Dark brushed aluminum in color..It remained in that same spot during my entire sighting of it..And repeating to myself over and over what is that??  having lived in the greater cincinnati airport area all my life...I was very used to airplanes blimps etc.. as we were under a flight path to the airport...When i approached a line of houses i could no longer see it...I had been walking very slowly..At that point i hurried past the first house...In between the first house and second was a driveway..And i could see it was still there.. i got excited and was hurrying home to tell my sister to come and look at it..When i approached my home..I froze up..I could not move my legs..I grabbed onto my neighbors fence..Being so close to my home..The bedroom window was open i started yelling for my sister to help me...We lived on the second floor over a beauty salon...There were about 20 steps to our apartment..She kept asking me what was wrong and i told her i could not move my legs she dragged (carried me up the steps...An ambulance was called...I was approximately 13) ..By the time the ambulance arrived i could walk again..They decided to examine me anyway and took me to the er..It was my first vaginal exam and so it stays clear in my mind..The doctor told my mother that i was probably going to start my first menses and i was released(i did not have my first menses until several years later)..I never told anyone what i had seen that day(maybe because of the drama of going to the hospital?)..A few years later i brought up the subject to my sister as she had a sighting she could not explain about 5 years after my event..That is when i finally told her what had happened that day. i have replayed this event over and over in my mind..For many years ...Everyone in my family has heard the story at this point and i get teased every now and again about it..I remember clearly the events before and after..I am now 58 yrs old.
content.summary: Blimp like, stationary, brushed aluminum, no windows, lights, sounds or appendages

content.detailedDescription: I was spending memorial day weekend in the long island area and was in new york city visiting the uss intrepid sea, air, and space museum. after touring the deck and interior of the museum i made my way to the adjacent dock to see the nearby concorde on display. it was new york fleet week so there were multiple news and tour helicopters flying up the hudson and a coast guard mh-65 helicopter performing a search and rescue demonstration over the water, there was also the normal commercial airliner traffic always seen in the area, with all this going on i had my eye on the sky anyway when i noticed another object that i didn't recognize, at first i thought it was a balloon, but upon closer visual inspection it appeared much larger than a balloon and was a different overall shape, and despite the noticeable wind that day the object appeared to be hovering in place or moving extremely slowly. it's color was also strange, it seemed to be mostly a metallic grey or chrome color, it was mostly circular in shape from my perspective. i estimated the objects altitude to be at around 4,000 feet more or less because it was noticeably higher than the various helicopters going up the hudson but considerably lower than the passing commercial airliners, i had no way to estimate the objects size due to its distance, and the lack of anything close enough to it to compare it with. after a few minutes the object began moving slowly and gradually increased it's speed. i began taking photos on my camera phone (an iphone 5) and began backing up to get a better view of the object before it passed over the deck of the intrepid and out of my sight. the following day i uploaded the photos onto my computer and reviewed them. the object was barely visible in the photos, but i cropped them to get a closer view of the object. the first few photos showed exactly what i described seeing, a small rounded metallic grey object hovering, however the 6th photo showed that the object clearly had a shaded edge to it proving it was an actual three-dimensional object. an uneven pattern began to develop where the object was completely shiny in one picture and then has a darker shaded edge in the next few, i could not explain if this was due to the sun shining on the object or not. however it was the 11th picture when i noticed things were becoming stranger. in this photo the original color and possibly even the shape of the object has significantly changed. on close visual analysis the photo shows the object as a definitively structured craft with a more angular shape to it, and a small ring of light around the center, something i did not notice while viewing the object (though i may have missed it through the phone lens). the final photo is by far the strangest, and most compelling, the object is again grey/chrome and metallic but the upper part appears to be a brighter blue-white color which may be reflective light or light generated by the object itself. i will submit all of the cropped, close-up photos and some of the original ones. there were no other witnesses that i ran into, although i find it unlikely that i was the only one who saw the object because there were hundreds of people on the museum deck and neighboring docks (not to mention the general area of manhattan) i did point out the object to my father who was unable to see it well at the distance and quickly dismissed it as probably being a balloon, however after i showed him the photos he no longer thought that. i have always been intrigued by the ufo phenomenon and know a lot about aviation and identifying aircraft, so all i can say is that the object i saw and photographed did not resemble or move like any normal airplane or helicopter i have seen before.
content.summary: Medium sized grey metallic moving object sighted moving over the hudson river

content.detailedDescription:
It was night and the moon wasn't present. i noticed what appeared to be a shooting star coming from the north, headed south. then a second object appeared next to it and they began almost playing with each other. they almost appeared to be spinning together then flew next to each other in a coordinated fashion. as they went over head, they made an abrupt right turn and headed west out of sight without stopping. 
they left no trail, didn't change brightness, no made any sound. they were travelling at a very high rate of speed and appeared to be at a very high altitude.
content.summary: 2 shooting star type objects that moved very fast and changed direction together

content.detailedDescription: Home on leave from the army aug/sep 1976.  pulled into driveway and observed object when i got out of the drivers seat. only thing made sense was a helicopter with maybe a spotlight. thought it possibly could be rustlers looking for cattle or hogs to call in trucks.  sent my brother to get a pair of binos. observed directly north from my parents acreage approx 9-11 pm in a clear star lit sky. watched stationary object for about 10 mins or so. it was extememly bright white and saucer shaped.  given a pair of binos by my brother.  before i could bring them to my eyes, the object, from a dead stop, streaked to the west out of eyesight in an instant.  undescribably fast. size of and distance from object unknown as seen in night sky and nothing to compare distance and size ratios to.  silent, brightest white, no light beam as in a spotlight of anykind. just your plain ole everyday white flying saucer. my mother and two younger brothers were also there witnessing this.  glad i saw it.
content.summary: Extremely white bright saucer shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: There was about 9 witness to this same time shortly after seeing these we had heard a strange hooting in the forest and something threw a large rock and destroyed four trees then silent
content.summary: Two of them about five to eight miles apart slowly tilting

content.detailedDescription: Friend was outside and called us to come out and take a look at something. as i looked up i saw 2 very bright orbs of light traveling slowly south and continued for over a minute. lead orb continued at a steady speed as the trailing orb slowed and blinked out then came back on a couple seconds later, continued for another 15 seconds then dimmed and went out. lead orb traveled for about 10 more seconds and also dimmed out and neither were seen again. this incident was witnessed by several people who were with me at the time and friend who called us out said she noticed two people across the street looking up and taking pic/video with cell phone. the picture i have attached was taken during incident. i have seen these orbs two streets over from this sighting location in the past 4 months at my apartment on 2 other occasions and have filed a report 54346 with mufon concerning those 3 sightings. i felt these orbs were very similar to the previous lights i saw except thought at first these were slightly brighter. i received picture from another person at sighting as my video was washed out by the parking lot lights across street.
content.summary: Two very bright gold/amber orbs

content.detailedDescription:
This morning, a little after four in the morning on my way to work, i was at the bus stop at the corner of court road and park manor, waiting for the bus. i looked up at the sky which was partly cloudy and saw what i thought was a star. then the " star" started to move. it began to fly erratically; flying in circles one moment then banking the next. i'm convinced that what i saw wasn't any conventional aircraft because its movements were just too strange and too weird. what i saw was a ufo.
  all my life i've always wanted to see one and now that i have has sparked an interest in life elsewhere amongst the stars. at first i couldn't believe what i was seeing but the more i looked i knew that it wasn't from this world.
    by the time the bus had arrnived i lost sight of it.
content.summary: The object at first glace looked to be star then it moved erratically.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: beautiful sunset may 26 2014 molokai hawaii south shore.  thick thunder clouds had passed over the last couple days and now were accumulated many miles to the south with the storm moving west.  the cloud line rose to about 20 degrees above the horizon. the rest of the sky seemed to be totally clear for 180degrees. so when the lightning went you could see the top of the cloud it came from.  thats what had me watching the horizon out my parlor window. it was well past dark and about 8pm when i decided to take a run to the store to pick up a few munchies for later. as i was driving the 1/8th mile to the store i still had the corner of my eye trying to catch the lightning on the horizon but instead i caught a sight of a light that seemed out of place. i could only catch a glimpse here and there through the houses,power lines and trees so it had to be no higher then 30degrees or so off the horizon. the further i drove the more the trees blocked the view. so i kept going to the store.  when i got to the store i jumped out and kinda walked backward looking southeast toward where i thought it should be. no dice. until i got to the entrance of the store and looked directly south down a side street that if it kept going would end in the ocean about 500 yards from my position, and saw the object moving from east to west in a descending ascending pattern. like a ball bouncing but more smooth and controlled with a steeper decent and lesser curve on the ascent.  would have to say it was at least over the ocean which was 500 yards probably way further. it got about two "bounces" and out pops another one following directly behind it.  so at this point im standing in the entrance of the store backward looking out toward the ocean. its a small store and the counter is right there so i turn to the lady and say theres ufo's flying around out here.  two ladies come out and watch as they take their last bounce and head out to the south west upward and disappear. so i go inside buy my chips and candy and one girl is still outside looking out and around.  the other girl follows me out. we look around and sure enough to the south east at about 50 deg from the horizon a stationary orange star.  so i point to it and ask the girl thats not the right color right? she says no. so i start walking to my truck to get home and get my camera. as soon as i start my truck as i am watching bam it vanishes. so thats the first and second and even third sighting i guess. so i drive home asap and almost bang a few parked cars because im staring at the sky. run inside grab my camera and go out on the porch. i filmed three different objects in three separate videos between i would say 830pm and 930pm.  these objects have a orange hew they all seem further away and higher in the sky then the ones the ladies and i had seen in town. my video is crappy and shaky and goes in and out of focus because it is a digital camera making video with lots of light pollution. the stars are not visible in the video but are totally visible for a hundred and eighty degrees from the camera point besides the 20gress above the horizon where the storm clouds are.  i also have a video of military helicopters flying in the same area a week or so before.  the difference between the heli's and whatever these are is unmistakable.  also jets and planes fly by all night everynight and look much different. this is high traffic airspace jets and such dont just turn off their lights around here. oddly the choppers did and thats why i filmed them. again though the choppers were a week or so earlier. i will post one of the ufo vids and the one of the choppers from a week prior.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Many separate sights over an hour of orange glowing orb type objects.

content.detailedDescription:
i live in a very rural portion of southern monterey county.
  laying in the sun looking up. blue sky conditions. craft viewed hovering overhead seemed to be ejecting a blue mist to camoflage itself.  all portions of craft became visible as seconds/minutes passed.  circular dull white light in center bottom of craft.  craft triangular in shape.With secondary "wing" on each leading edge.
   subjective opinion:  craft was observing me.  craft knew i observed it.
   i tried to keep from blinking intent on observing craft.
   when i blinked a second time craft disappeared.  
   conclusion:  craft flew off at an incredible speed.
   
   visited by 10 mountain special forces at midnight within a week of event.  troopers asked to use phone to call for a dust off.  i was told a trooper had been victim of "scorpion bite."  asked to drive pair back into the national forest to link up with their squad.  troop refused to take ice to treat victim. they knew i had a four wheel drive despite it being parked in garage.
content.summary: Observed from supine position as craft hovered

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting home at about 1030pm when i noticed a very bright white star-like object which i thought nothing of. as i casually walked towards my house i saw the object abruptly and with incredible speed descend to below the tree line and out of my sight. the object was approximately 2-4 miles away from me and left no trail and had no sound.
content.summary: Bright star like object seen hovering and then abruptly descending

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work at night, and i saw what i first thought was a falling star, only it "fell" rapidly, then went back up and over to my right, just as rapidly in a split second. i was watching it, and then saw a large green ball of light come down out of the sky, to my right. months later, i saw a large green ball of light come down again in the same field of vision. this time my 25 year old daughter was with me and she saw it too. i was relieved somewhat to read that a lot of people saw the green fireballs, but i didn't notice if anyone else reported seeing the "falling star" part of the light show, too.

also; i don't remember the month, other than it was warm out and during the daytime (and was last year 2013), but i was astonished to see a huge craft of some sort that appeared to be almost invisible. it was like i saw the outline of it and some details and then it disappeared behind a cloud bank. it was like the image of it was superimposed in front of the clouds at first, and then it went into one to hide. there was no place on the highway to pull over or i would have just stared at the sky until it came out of the clouds again. it was not a plane, nor plane shaped.
content.summary: Saw ufo then green ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Chilling on patio on zero gravity chair and observed a fast moving object in the sky. could be a bird but it moves pretty fast for one. i watched the video many times but i do not have programs to enhance the image. i can not tell what it is.
content.summary: High speed object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife christine and i were walking our dog. christine looked up in clear blue sky and saw a commercial jet flying, then said she could see solid
spheres nearby. they appeared higher than the jet. i looked up and saw them too. first three white spheres formed a triangle. must have been a few miles apart. we saw this formation for 2-3 minutes.
then a red sphere appeared and formed a rectangle with the four spheres at each corner. this formation lasted 2-3 minutes.
then two white spheres continued to ascend higher and could not be seen along with the red sphere.
then the two remaining white spheres remained stationary and a blue sphere
slowly moved across their paths very closely. the blue sphere then remained stationary with the two white spheres for another 2-3 minutes.
then they too began to ascend together till we could not see them anymore.
all spheres were higher than jets flying by.
interestingly, just as two more commercial jets began to arrive in this
air space, that is exactly the time the spheres ascended out of view.
the whole event took about 10 minutes of viewing.
content.summary: Saw a total of 5 spheres near wispy high cloud, must have been over 10 miles high

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out to my car from my home around 6:30 am when i noticed what first appeared to be an airliner overhead in the clear blue sky. it was moving from west to east at high altitude and at a comparible speed to an airliner in my estimation.  as i looked closer, i noticed the object did not appear to have wings. at this point, i pulled out my phone to take a few pictures of the object. i then took a short video. after the object was far enough away so as not to be visible, i got in my car and cropped the photos down to get a closer look. it was then that i was pretty sure that what i had just saw was no conventional aircraft. it appeared to have no wings or tailwing. it also appeared to be rectangular in shape, with perfectly squared front and back. did not look at all aerodynamic in the pictures. i shared the video and pictures with a friend who is a ups pilot, and while he cannot completely rule out the possibility it was an airplane, he is equally puzzled by the rectangular shape and lack of visible wings.
content.summary: Rectangular shaped object with no wings visible passed over at high altitude moving west to east. no noise heard

content.detailedDescription: They connected with me somehow. i can't explain in but it's like i seen what's coming for this planet
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft with two orange circles behind it hovered above me in the middle of the night , i tried to video it but my iphone turned off three times and sure enough when it turned on , it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
I left work at 10 pm. may 25th when a co worker made a comment about a red light in the sky. i look up and noticed a reddish/orange light(not blinking) in a stationary position less than a mile up to the southwest. drove to a darker part of parking lot to get a better view but lost visual contact while looking through my sunroof. did not see move out of view but object was gone once i parked my car. i work next to the airport. this was not a plane or helicopter, no sound or blinking lights.

checked your site today to see if anyone else had reported this object and sure enough, a person living a few counties southwest of here reported the same object at the exact same time. 10 pm. may 25th.
content.summary: Red/orange stationary light. multiple reports from different locations exact same time.

content.detailedDescription: We need to talk to someone in private about this! please mufon. several people have details to add and we feel the urgency to voice our stories>>
content.features: Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: My friends and i have witnessed pale blue humanoids in a very close proximity to our bodies. total time was 40 to 50 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired kansas city police officer and was working security at baptist hospital in kansas city, missouri in october of 2013 when i was bringing in the life flight helicopter late one evening. as the pilot was starting to descend from about 1200 feet i noticed a bright bullet-shaped object moving from west to east in a straight-line path at about 1000 feet.  the object was lower than the helicopter and not far from it. it had a rounded front with a defined darker center and pointed back, with no wings or tail. it was a metallic silver color with a white glow all around it, and there were sparks being emitted from the front of the object which flew to the back, leaving a trail. this object did not waver from its course, even though it was very close to the helicopter. when the pilot landed he asked me if i saw that object and i replied yes. the pilot said that he radioed life flight headquarters to request to follow the unidentified object but they told him he must deliver the patient first. as the helicopter landed the object was out of sight. a nurse who was with me saw it as well and we all we watched the object for at least three minutes. at the time we did not know who to report this to as reporting to the police was out of the question (i had taken reports from others and had my own sightings while on the force and this was not something they wanted to take reports on) but later met a mufon investigator and told her about it.
content.summary: Large bullet-shaped object with sparks flying off it witness by pilot and police officer

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my balcony, smoking and watching the stars, when i suddenly realized a very bright triangular formation that i have never seen before. because i only smoke outside, i am watching the stars almost every night. it was the brightest thing in the night sky in that moment. there were no clouds at all. the sky was crystal clear. three stationary glowing spheres in a triangular formation hovering. it was a perfect triangle pointing downward. each side had the same length. i immediately knew these do not belong there. the formation seemed to be twice or three times the usual moon size. they were just sitting there for some seconds and i was in awe. then all startet to move inward their formation slowly with a mathematical precise angle meeting in the middle of the former triangle. they were disintegrating and dissolving into nothing when they met each other. i just could not believe it, but i was not afraid. i just knew something very beautiful had happend. i would testify this anytime under any given circumstances. i know what i saw. this was real.
content.summary: Three stationary spheres in a triangle formation hovering, then all moving simultanously and slowly into the center of formation and disintegrating.
